full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Servi OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS; FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, GULU T. ADVANI , residing at 1218 ST. MATTHEU WAY (Name) CA (Street and number) Los ALTOS 94022 USA (City) (State) (ZIP Code. if in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on 2/22/36 at HYDERABAD PAKISJAN Also, answer either a, b or c, as appro- Date) (City) (Country) priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization 9574470 (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number 2. That I am 41 years of age and have resided in the United States since 1957 SEPT 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 1218 ST. MATTHEW WAY Los ALTOS CA 94022 COUNTRY MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO NAME SEX AGE OF BIRTH SINGLE DEPONENT RUKMANI ADVANI F 70 PAKISTAN SNIPOWED MOTHER 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of ENGINEER with HEWLETT PACKARD (Name of concern) at 11,000 WOLFE Ro, Cuperative and derive a net annual income of 34,344 (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) CA banks in this country 20,000 (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is 200,000 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $10,000 market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 1218 ST MATTHEN valued at $150,000 with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $30,000 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $ 70,000. cash surrender value of $ O (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See instructions for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) WHOLLY PARTIALLY NAME OF PERSON DEPENDENT DEPENDENT AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME FOIA (b)(6) INDRA ADVANI FOIA (b)(6) 35 FOIA (b)(6) WIFE FOIA (b)(6) Form I-134 (Rev. 3-1-76)N
